website_summaries.verdict: Your little one can experience the cool and iconic look of a Timberland boot with these classic 3-eye boots. With textile lining that wicks moisture away, your child's feet will be dry and comfortable all day.
pros: Cushioned EVA footbed delivers long lasting support for maximum ease
Finished with a durable rubber outsole that provides all-day traction and underfoot support
Comes in both black and butter pecan
cons: If your child is very little, these boots can be hard to walk in for new walkers
The toe can run a bit wide

customer_reviews.title: Timberlands..Ok
customer_reviews.text: Read the other reviews I placed a order they came in on time they look like timberland but the only issue I had was how they came one shoe was in the box and the other was in the bag and the box was pretty damage and one boot had a small starch no smell if your a timberland fan you no they have a fresh boot smell these didn't but they are OK not really a fan but I will wear them to order from this company again I will not I will pay the extra to buy from the local mall next time..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for my wide footed autistic boy.
customer_reviews.text: My autistic son does not do lase up shoes, but he love these boots because they are one of the few shoes his feet can fit in and he can stomp around in. He is always excited to buy them on and play.
customer_reviews.author: Nate Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: These are really narrow at the tow and are mid height. Order a size up
customer_reviews.author: Shay

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes for me. I wear a size 6 in boys, and they are so comfortable that it does not feel that I have them on! I love Timberlands, and I always buy them in boys size for the excellent fit and they cost much less than the women's size 8.
customer_reviews.author: Delores Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Very versatile and stylish
customer_reviews.text: I just love everything about this shoe. It’s the classic timberland for my nephew who is 6 and he loved them! I got him the yellow. A plus for me is that they look good yet are versatile for Georgia winter weather. Timberlands are a classic.

customer_reviews.title: These are not authentic. Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: These are knock-offs, poorly crafted, soles and material make it obvious not real Timbs. Sent back as soon as received. Very upsetting for the price and they arrived 3 days late. Have to go to the mall to buy anyway. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Q.

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes for Women!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these boots! I normally wear a women's size 6 but I bought a kids size 4.5 for the price advantage and because of the lower height of the boot. These fit great and I cannot wait to wear! My only complaint is that the arch support is not great, but this is easily fixable with some insoles!

customer_reviews.title: Be careful with the sizes if you aren’t too sure

customer_reviews.title: Great for Looks, Not Great for Walking
customer_reviews.text: Ordered size 4.5 for my 15 month old (normally size 4 but want him to wear with thick socks). They are a bit heavy for a new walker so he probably will not wear these on a daily basis. I also noticed that the inside of his ankles were red after wearing them but I may have just tied them too tight. We ordered these for family photos and they worked perfectly, but again not something a toddler could wear daily.

product_meta.title: Timberland Classic 3 Eye Chukka
product_meta.description:
* Keep them classic in the Timberland® Kids 3 Eye Chukka.
 * Chukka in a full-grain leather upper.
 * Lace-up closure for snug fit.
 * Padded collar for comfort.
 * Textile lining and footbed cover create a comfortable environment for the foot. 
 * Shock absorbing EVA footbed cradles the foot for all-day cushioning. 
 * Rubber lug outsole for traction. 
 * Imported.
 * Measurements: *  Heel Height: 3⁄4 in
    *  Weight: 6.4 oz
    *  Shaft: 3 in
   
   
 * Product measurements were taken using size 1 Little Kid, width M. Please note that measurements may vary by size.
 * Weight of footwear is based on a single item, not a pair.
feature_bullets: Ankle boot in full-grain leather featuring lace-up vamp, lugged sole, and padded puffy collar;EVA foam footbed;Moisture-wicking textile lining;
